title: Ignota's SCP-6335 Pixel Fanart
content:

[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/XiLxyM0.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7083750038744223018?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6335 SCP-6335]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6335.mp4, 6335.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7083750038744223018?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-335 by Limeyy and Ralliston
[[/<]]
-----

Okay WOW, I kept putting off doing this one because I wanted to be super ambitious and wanted to make the whole planet turn slowly but realized after drawing the first frame that I COULD NOT do that lmao. 

I like this article! It's got a simple concept that I suppose is pretty "common"(?) but the angle it was portrayed at is unique and interesting enough to keep me interested and ends up as something I liked quite a lot!

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
